feed.title: DepCtrl Recent Updates
feed.subtitle: List of recently updated DependencyControl Macros.

entry.title: Aegisub Perspective-Motion - 0.1.5
entry.content: • Move line2fbf function to a separate Util module

entry.title: Derive Perspective Track - 1.1.2
entry.content:
• Remove unused Line dependency
  • Switch to prepareForPerspective function

entry.title: Resample Perspective - 2.1.0
entry.content: • Move some more logic over to the Perspective module

entry.title: Encode Clip - 1.0.0
entry.content:
• Proper 1.0 release finally! (it was about time)
  • Add dummy video encoding using lavfi (doesn't support checkerboard)

entry.title: Aegisub-Perspective-Motion BETA - 0.3.1
entry.content: • Save tracking datas ambient quad to extradata

entry.title: Aegisub-Color-Tracking - 2.0.2
entry.content:
• Fix handling of tracking data when using Aegisub built-in frame API
  • Refactor internal handling of timecodes

entry.title: Gradient Cut - 1.3.4
entry.content: • Fix crash due to incomplete clipper2 reversion

entry.title: Lua Interpreter - 1.3.1
entry.content: • Fix modify not working for vector clips

entry.title: Typewriter - 0.7.0
entry.content:
• Refactor the partitioning logic in typewrite_line to use a state machine-based approach
  • For an active_char immediately following an override block, ensure that the override block is put in start (It was previously being deleted accidentally)
  • Treat text tags \N, \n and \h as single characters and remove the hackfix

entry.title: Hyperdimensional Relocator - 4.5.2
entry.content: • Follow user defined rounding for vector clips

entry.title: Circular text - 0.2.1
entry.content: • Deals with accented characters or special characters

entry.title: Extrapolate Move - 0.1.5
entry.content:
• Now outputs .01 precision co-ords instead of integer
  • No longer requires dependencycontrol to work

entry.title: Clip Size - 1.3.0
entry.content:
• Add support for rect clips and subpixel accuracy
  • Move to 'stable' Git branch for DependencyControl

entry.title: Jump to Next++ - 0.1.5
entry.content:
• Add jumping by end time
  • Move to 'stable' Git branch for DependencyControl

entry.title: Paste From Pad - 0.0.2
entry.content: • Create new lines when going beyond the existing number of lines

entry.title: Merge Scripts - 0.0.13
entry.content:
• Add wildcard support for import definitions
  • Add support for selectively exporting changes to only specified files
  • Make it possible to export changes even if the target file does not exist
  • When exporting, resolve the paths of target files using the current location of the template rather than the location when the files were originally imported

entry.title: ASSWipe - 0.5.0
entry.content: • The 'Merge consecutive tag sections' feature now skips sections that contain any tag from a customizable exception list. Defaults to karaoke tags to avoid breaking poorly written karaoke templater scripts.

entry.title: Shake It - 0.2.0
entry.content:
• Added a separate macro for shaking scalar-type tags.
  • Line grouping can now be guided by a configurable line field or be turned off altogether.
  • The last dialog choice are now automatically saved and recalled.
  • Random offset patterns can now be configured to repeat every n line groups.

entry.title: Move Along Path - 0.2.1
entry.content: • Entering the automation menu with no lines selected no longer results in an error message.

entry.title: Highlight Substring - 0.1.1
entry.content: • HighlightSubstring now properly works with ASSFoundation v0.4.0+

entry.title: Insert Line Breaks - 0.2.0
entry.content: • The script was ported to MoonScript and dependencies have been updated to their latest versions.

entry.title: Merge Drawings - 0.2.0
entry.content:
• The final merged drawing is trimmed in such a way that its top-left-most point is also its origin. Position/Move tags are added/adjusted in order for the drawing to retain its position on the canvas.
  • Dependencies have been updated to their latest versions.

entry.title: Nudge - 0.5.0
entry.content:
• The script was ported to MoonScript and dependencies have been updated to their latest versions.
  • The default align nudgers are now configured to maintain line positioning.
  • An option was added for a nudger to strip or keep sections left empty after performing the desired operation.

entry.title: Paste AI Lines - 0.2.0
entry.content: • The script was ported to MoonScript and dependencies have been updated to their latest versions.

entry.title: Split Lines - 0.2.0
entry.content:
• Split lines that would only contain whitespace are no longer written to the script.
  • Dependencies have been updated to their latest versions.

entry.title: Vertical Text - 0.2.0
entry.content: • The script was ported to MoonScript and dependencies have been updated to their latest versions.

entry.title: Frame-by-frame transform - 2.0.1
entry.content:
• Fixed a minor isssue uncovered by Moonscript linter.
  • Switched to maintained Functional library.

entry.title: Gradient Everything - 2.0.3
entry.content:
• Switched to DependencyControl logger module for logging.
  • Switched to maintained Functional library.

entry.title: DependencyControl Toolbox - 0.1.3
entry.content: • Fixed an issue where trying to uninstall an unmanaged script resulted in an error unrelated to the intended error message.

entry.title: Encode - Hardsub - 1.2.0
entry.content: • fixed an issue with the encode being deleted when not muxing audio; fixed some issues resulting from subtitles not being saved

entry.title: Encode - Hardsub - 1.2.0
entry.content: • fixed an issue with the encode being deleted when not muxing audio; fixed some issues resulting from subtitles not being saved

entry.title: iBus - 1.7.0
entry.content: • merged Italics and Bold scripts and added Underline and Strikeout; added DependencyControl

entry.title: Jump to Next - 2.0.0
entry.content: • 13 macros; Text/Style/Actor/Effect/Layer/CommentedLine x Next/Previous = 12 hotkeys + 1 for GUI version with all 12 options

entry.title: Blur and Glow - 2.5.0
entry.content: • default blur part of config; cleaned up the code a bit; added DespondencyControl

entry.title: Change Case - 3.0.0
entry.content: • improved; added options; unicode support; added DespondencyControl

entry.title: iBus - 1.7.0
entry.content: • merged Italics and Bold scripts and added Underline and Strikeout; added DependencyControl

entry.title: Jump to Next - 2.0.0
entry.content: • 13 macros; Text/Style/Actor/Effect/Layer/CommentedLine x Next/Previous = 12 hotkeys + 1 for GUI version with all 12 options

entry.title: Blur and Glow - 2.5.0
entry.content: • default blur part of config; cleaned up the code a bit; added DespondencyControl

entry.title: Change Case - 3.0.0
entry.content: • improved; added options; unicode support; added DespondencyControl

entry.title: Gradient along clip edge - 0.2.0
entry.content:
• Added DependencyControl
  • The color picker dialogs no longer show incorrect default colors.
